column3: 2. Do you currently have an analytics department/team in your organisation?
column4: 3. How many different vendors do you use for all of your marketing activities? (events, PR, influencers, social, media etc.)
column5: 4. How many different data sources/categories do you currently use to assess marketing performance? (Social, PR, Events, Ads etc.)
column6: 5. How often do you request to receive reports from your vendors?
column7: 6. How taxing do you find the compilation of monthly, quarterly, annual reports that combine multiple data points from different vendors to get a holistic view of performance?
column8: 7. How good do you think your organization is at using multiple data sources to unlock cross-disciplinary insights (for instance comparing earned PR to paid social results)?
column9: 8. How confident are you that you have a clear, unified view of performance and ROI across all marketing channels? (eg. events, earned media, paid spend, production)
column10: 9. Do you maintain a multi-year repository of prior performance data that you utilise to drive/benchmark/inform future strategy?
column11: 10. What is the single biggest challenge you face when trying to understand marketing performance across channels?
column12: 11. How long does it typically take to get a reliable performance view after a major campaign or quarter ends?
column13: 12. Which of the following do you currently rely on? (Select all that apply)
column14: 13. How valuable would a single, independent view combining paid, social, PR, influencer, and events etc data be for your role?
column15: 14. What would you primarily use this for?
column16: 15. What would most likely make you try or switch to a new marketing insights partner?
column17: 16. What budget would you be willing to allocate towards a service that provides monthly reports that combine multiple data source (eg. earned, social, events, advertising) to uncover actionable insights?
column18: 17. What budget would you be willing to allocate towards a service that provides annual reports that combine multiple data source (eg. earned, social, events, advertising) to uncover actionable insights?

column11: Lack of unified cross-channel view
column13: Agency reports, Excel / manual reporting
column15: Budget allocation & optimisation, Agency performance evaluation, Strategic planning
column16: Faster insights, Clearer ROI attribution, Reduced reporting effort
